sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
Gods vniuersal right proclaimed A sermon preached at Paules Crosse, the 27. of March 1603. being the next Sunday after her Maiesties departure. By I.H. Hayward, John, D.D.
[62] p.
[By R. Reade] for Cuthburt Burby, Imprinted at London : 1603.
I.H. = John Hayward. Printer's name from STC. Signatures: A-D (-D8). Running title reads: A sermon preached at Paules Crosse the 27. of March. 1603. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
Gods vniuersal right proclaimed A sermon preached at Paules Crosse, the 27. of March 1603. being the next Sunday after her Maiesties departure. By I.H. Hayward, John, D.D.
[62] p.
[By R. Reade] for Cuthburt Burby, Imprinted at London : 1603.
I.H. = John Hayward. Printer's name from STC. Signatures: A-D (-D8). Running title reads: A sermon preached at Paules Crosse the 27. of March. 1603. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
Cuthburt Burby
R. Reade]
